Articles.Content:
Hello, I want to create a Plugin, and I've already done the basic settings in Visual Studios. I created a window, and in that window different informations should stand, for example the speed/ altitude/ flight time etc. How can I say KSP, that these informations will be shown in that window? (It would be perfect if anybody could share a Sourcecode, that's easier to understand for me ).

Aaand excuse my english :S

I'm not sure you can use C++, C# is the officially supported language for KSP mods.

The wiki has the setup procedure for this, including the two dll's you need to reference.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Setting_up_Visual_Studio

Once that is done, all the objects available for speed/altitude/flight time will show in the Object Browser and you can pick what you need.

D.
There are some example plugins with source code to get you started here.
